events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I do not need this product.
The case has been categorized under the refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Assigning the refund case to agent Emily Smith for further handling and resolution.
Hello, Iâ€™m Emily and I will assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I also know the exact item you received and what you ordered?
My order number is 987654321. I ordered the blue wireless headphones but received a red case instead. This is very disappointing.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the wrong item.
Thank you for your quick response and for arranging the refund and return label so promptly.
The refund process has been completed on our end and the return label sent to your email. Please check and let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and return label without any issues. Please contact us if anything else is needed.
We are closing this case now as the refund was confirmed received and no further issues reported by the customer.
